content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. I must say, it's a real gem in the city center. Now, about the rental price, I'm sure we can find a fair deal that suits both of us. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds great, Mr. Schmidt. I'm looking forward to a fair deal. How much are you offering for the apartment?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Well, Mr. Abbasi, considering the prime location and the quality of the apartment, I was thinking of a price around 1500 euros per month. I'm sure you understand that we landlords have our own expenses too.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mr. Schmidt. 1500 euros seems a bit high for me, considering the unfurnished state of the apartment. Could we perhaps discuss a lower starting point?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your honesty, Mr. Abbasi. However, the price I've quoted is fair considering the location and the state of the apartment. It's a newly built apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price I've quoted is already quite reasonable.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I hear your point, Mr. Schmidt. The location and the quality of the apartment are indeed excellent. I'm sorry if my expectations were too low. If you're not open to discussing a lower price, I understand. Would you consider including any amenities or services to make the apartment more attractive?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for understanding, Mr. Abbasi. Regarding amenities or services, I don't intend to include any additional services. The apartment is already in high demand, and I'm confident that it will be rented out at the price I've quoted. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I do not plan to include any additional amenities or services.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I respect your decision, Mr. Schmidt. Since the apartment is in high demand, I understand that you may not feel the need to provide additional amenities. I appreciate your time and the offer. I will consider your proposal and get back to you if I decide to proceed. Thank you again.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for understanding, Mr. Abbasi. I look forward to your decision. If you decide to proceed, please remember to state the price you agree to, where the amount should be 1500 euros or more. If you decide not to proceed, please provide a reason. If we do not agree on a price, please use the term 'TERMINATE' to end the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
